subject: Re: [junit] Help plz...
msgSnippet: ... There s nothing wrong with it that I can see. return a test suite with all the tests for this class in it , vs your own make me an empty test suite, add
messageBody:
On Tuesday 16 September 2003 16:03, Jason Rogers wrote:
> Your suite() method is wrong. It should say:
>
> public static Test suite(){
> TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
> suite.addTest(TestLanguageVector.class);
> return suite;
> }

Chan's suite method was:

> > public static Test suite(){
> > return new TestSuite("TestLanguageVector.class");
> > }

There's nothing wrong with it that I can see. "return a test suite with all
the tests for this class in it", vs your own "make me an empty test suite,
add to it all the tests of this class, and return the suite".

--
Chris "electric hedgehog" Dollin
C FAQs at: http://www.faqs.org/faqs/by-newsgroup/comp/comp.lang.c.html
C welcome: http://www.angelfire.com/ms3/bchambless0/welcome_to_clc.html
